name: Helm Chart 最小
description: Chart.yaml と Deployment テンプレートの最小構成

files.template:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: {{`{{ .Chart.Name }}`}}
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: {{`{{ .Chart.Name }}`}}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: {{`{{ .Chart.Name }}`}}
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: app
          image: nginx:alpine
          ports:
            - containerPort: 80
